EmailTemplate.name: ES-05-09-2019 APM eBook Send #1 - Marketo.APM eBook Send #1
EmailTemplate.subject: Best Practices for AWS and Azure Performance Management
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Applications now make or break businesses, with customers interacting through digital and mobile experiences. In today's multicloud world and container architectures, enterprises are challenged to manage application resourcing with existing IT staff and skills.
How can you and your team manage application performance in AWS and Azure to keep up?
Download our latest whitepaper <[[https://turbonomic.com/application-driven-cloud-optimization/?utm_campaign=7012o000001oSbKAAU]]> to learn how to:
- Automate application resource management to assure performance at the lowest possible cost - Increase cross-team collaboration and IT staff productivity - Eliminate siloed management tools and licensing
I hope you find it helpful!
Best, Elizabeth
